text: Practice Problem 12.6 (solution page 1072) A. Using the analysis from Section 12.4, fill each entry in the following table with "Yes” or “No” for the example program in Figure 12.15. In the first column, the notation v. denotes an instance of variable v residing on the local stack for thread , where is either m (main thread), po (peer thread 0), or p1 (peer thread 1), Variable Referenced by instance main thread? — peerthread0? — peer thread 1? ptr ent msgs.n e e e nyid.po myid.pt B. Given the analysis in part A, which of the variables ptr, cnt, 1. nsgs. and nyid are shared?
